# Anti-Ectoplasm Shell (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time**: 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range**: 10 ft.

**Area**: 10-ft.-radius emanation, centered on you

**Duration**: 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw**: None

**Spell Resistance**: Yes

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 49

As *[[Antilife Shell (Spell)|antilife shell]]**,* except that it affects only ectoplasm, whether inert or part of an ectoplasmic creature.
